info.titleen: I got one like that last year.
info.descko: 아들을 위해 엄마가 선택한 케이크 모양은?
info.descen: How about baking a birthday cake for her?

sentense.en: Yes, I'd like to buy a cake for my son's birthday.
sentense.en_: Please, I'd like to buy a cake for my son's birthday.
sentense.ko: 네, 제 아들 생일 케이크를 사고 싶어요.

sentense.en: If he likes sports, then the one with the baseball and bat might be good.
sentense.en_: If he likes sports, then the one with the baseball and bat might be good.
sentense.ko: 만약 아이가 스포츠를 좋아한다면, 야구공과 방망이가 있는 것이 좋겠군요.

sentense.en: Yes, he is crazy about baseball.
sentense.en_: Yes, he is crazy about baseball.

sentense.en: But I got one like that last year.
sentense.en_: But I got one like that last year.
sentense.ko: 그러나, 지난해 그것과 같은 것을 샀어요.

sentense.en: Well, he probably wouldn't like the dancer.
sentense.en_: Well, he probably wouldn't like the dancer.
sentense.ko: 글쎄요, 그 아이가 설마 댄서를 좋아하지는 않겠지요.

sentense.en: How about the one with the car on it?
sentense.en_: How about the one with the car on it?
sentense.ko: 그럼 그것(케이크) 위에 차가 있는 것은 어떨까요?

sentense.en: Hmm... I don't think so. Oh, look at this one with the drum on it.
sentense.en_: Hmm... I don't think so. Oh, look at this one with the drum on it.
sentense.ko: 음... 그렇게 생각하지 않아요(별로에요). 오, 드럼이 있는 것 좀 보아요.

sentense.en: He loves it. Whenever he listens to music, he beats time with his pencils.
sentense.en_: He loves it. Whenever he listens to music, he beats time with his pencils.
sentense.ko: 그는 음악을 사랑해요. 그가 음악을 들을 때마다 연필로 박자를 맞춰요.
